name: The Resistance (itch)
description:
This is a very simple twin stick shooter roguelight with some progression. It is also my first game ever ;)

It features:

  • Simple base management
  • 7 Different Ship Types to choose from
  • 5 Bossfights
  • Endless- & Challengemodes

a little (sadly low res) video can be found here:

If you prefer to play the game in Browser you can visit http://drnifflon.weebly.com/shooty.html (Does not work with Google Chrome)
